body.head: NNA019483

p.note: Publications of the Jesup North Pacific Expedition, Vol. X, p. 214.

body.p: Q!āʼnēqīᵋlax̣ᵘstarted, and saw the Mink sharpening [something]. "What is that?" - "This will be for taking revenge." "Give it to me, that I may see it!" - "This is nice. Turn your back to me." Then he put it on his back. "Go start! You shall be the mink of later man."
